main.name: Jisung Jung
main.description: Performing big data analysis, machine learning, and AI technology, I boost your business by addressing complex problems and making data-driven decisions. Let's start scrolling and learn more about me
main.bio: Now I am working as a data analyst. I had managed millions of engineering data and project systems at plant construction field from 2006 to 2018. I majored in business administration both bachelor's and master´s degrees, also majored in double master's in business analytics degree. Contracted work for a freelance employee, I am executing quality data analysis by Python, R, and Oracle Database for manufacturing equipment and components in the SK Hynix. I am interested in retro styles of pop music, classic cameras, and classic arcade games.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: As an aspiring data scientist, I can use python, R, SQL, Tableau and cloud AI platform to analyze data

education.description: Deep dive into modern data science to gain the analytical capability and business acumen to translate data into meaningful actions.

Study every business topic through a global lens, master working cross-culturally, leverage disruptive technologies to shape the future, and develop the deep self-awareness needed to lead effectively and with confidence.
Build a well-rounded foundation in business administration to recognize business problems and opportunities, to develop innovative responses to them.

work.title: Business Data Analyst, Analytic and Insights
work.description: Enhance analytical capabilities and AI power for components and equipment quality management in SK Hynix.

work.title: Head of Product Management, Startup member
work.description: Build travel inspiration and research focused mobile application and go-to-market strategy from ideation to launch.

work.title: Project IT Manager, Technical Document Specialist
work.description: Led for project IT administration and data management. Established and operated technical document control systems.

projects.title: Tweets Text Mining Analysis
projects.category: Through Twitter text data, we examine the biggest music streaming platform’s characteristics and interests, visualize significant relationships.

projects.title: Tableau Interactive Dashboard
projects.category: This report is about the representation of the performance in sales and profit for superstore company dated from 2018 to 2019.

projects.title: Air France Flexdashboard
projects.category: We diagnose Air France how to maximize the net earning and maximize the returns of its Internet marketing campaigns by assessing strategy options.

projects.title: Apprentice Chef Analysis
projects.category: With ML models, we detect the consumer behaviors and find insights to make the business stay relevant to existing and potential customers.

projects.title: Intel Asia Campaign - Catch & Win
projects.category: With the linear programming, Intel’s campaign budget which aims to emerging country markets can be well allocated and finalize the plan with optimal results.

projects.title: NUS - Visual Data Storytelling
projects.category: This data visualization shows NUS conspectus, multiple plots of employment rate and monthly salary for graduates and so forth to prove NUS is the future for children.

projects.title: PCA Analysis - Windows? or Mac?
projects.category: We analyze the current demographic and behaviors to find Apple's current customers and next steps for future campaigns based on their personality traits.

projects.title: Presenting the Financial Statement
projects.category: After a deep understanding of the design of the accounting entry data through the Entity Relationship (ER) Diagram, we develop the organized B/S and P&L.

projects.title: Speech to Text Survey Analysis
projects.category: Uncover insights on what behaviors or textual patterns differentiate individuals who label themselves as people person from those who do not.

projects.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
projects.category: An analysis of the world bank data used descriptive statistics and data visualization to get insights from North America and the Latin America (NALA).

projects.title: Analysis of Job Satisfaction Survey
projects.category: We have performed multiple regression tests To measure the relationship between employees’ perceptions of organization and job satisfaction.

projects.title: Google Merchandise Store Analysis
projects.category: This report examines goals, performance, and results and makes proposed recommendations that the website can use to improve their performances.
